overview.title: Welcome to SOIL: The Sustainable Farming Simulator
overview.description: Navigate the challenges and rewards of modern agriculture in this interactive simulation game.
overview.paragraph1: SOIL is an immersive simulation game where you step into the shoes of a farmer making crucial ecological and economic decisions. Experience the direct consequences of your choices on your virtual farm's health and productivity.
overview.paragraph2: Discover the principles of sustainable farming, master resource management, and understand the delicate balance between agricultural practices and environmental well-being. SOIL is designed to educate and engage players on the complexities of food production and its impact on our planet.
